name: The Baphomet Bazaar
description:
The Baphomet Bazaar

Like running a small retail store, except everything you sell is cursed and has a terrible cost. On the plus side, your customers are willing to pay the price. Gather strange ingredients by matching them on the board and fulfil the orders that come in. But you better hurry, they will not wait forever...

---

This game is in very early development and will likely change drastically. Also, I have a baby so don't expect regular updates  😅

Also, this game is open source, meaning all of the game's source code is available on GitHub.
